summary: One Direction, or 1D, was a popular English-Irish boy band formed in 2010. The group consisted of five members, including Zayn Malik who left in 2015. They rose to fame after appearing on "The X Factor" and became one of the best-selling boy bands ever. Their music was a huge hit, with five top-charting albums and many popular songs. The band went on hiatus in 2016 but had already won over 200 awards and sold 70 million records worldwide. They were known for their massive concert tours and were considered teen idols.
title: One Direction
